## Objective

Here I make a document containing credentials needed to run code. Credentials get hidden in final HTML file. 
### Setup 

We need the source file. 

```{r}
source("Utility.R")
```

Top chunk contains run code. Bottom chunk code to display.

```{r, echo = FALSE}
# Set up your own credentials
set.email( 'glo003@bucknell.edu' )
set.key( 'goldram72' )
create.authentication()
```

```{r eval = FALSE}
set.email( 'youremail@domain.com' )
set.key( 'yourkey' )
create.authentication()
```
